Align Weapon (C2 Tran): Touched weapon gains alignment (DC 14 Will neg) for 20 min

Magic Notes:
Wisdom Legate Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level C1, C2
Deadly Touch: Touch kills target w/up to 20d6 HP 1/dy
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Forge Ring: May create and mend magic rings
Spontaneous Legate Spell: Cast Inflict in place of known spell
Temple Dependency: Must participate at temple to receive spells
Widen Spell: May use +3 spell slot to dbl chosen spell area of affect
